div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 682 Catalina, c. 30 km. NE of Cluj, Ru- mania, 1881 Burial: 1st cent. B.C. (Mitrea) Contents: AR. Pot hoard Thasos: spread-flan tetradr. Roman Rep.: den. Disposition: dispersed Martian, Repertoriu arheologic pentru Ardeal (Bistrita, 1920), s.v. no. 136 Mitrea, ED 10 (1945), p. 67
